entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:06 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 07:06 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
